id.fieldDescription: HTML ID attribute to apply to the component.
id.name: ./id

linkURL.fieldDescription: Links the title. Path to a content page, external URL or page anchor.
linkURL.name: ./linkURL

subheaderLinkURL.fieldDescription: Links the subheader. Path to a content page, external URL or page anchor.
subheaderLinkURL.name: ./subheaderLinkURL

enableBluebar.fieldDescription: Check This To Enable Bluebar On Left Side Of Description Text
enableBluebar.name: ./enableBluebar

disableLinkTracking.fieldDescription: If checked, the data attributes will not be tracked
disableLinkTracking.name: ./disableLinkTracking
